explains: n. 狙击；[鸟] 鹬；香烟屁股；被开玩笑的人物
vi. 狙击；[军] 伏击；抨击；猎鸟；诽谤

sentences.en: Gunmen continued to snipe at people leaving their homes to find food.
sentences.cn: 枪手不断伏击外出找寻食物的人。

sentences.en: There was not much elbow room in the cockpit of a Snipe.
sentences.cn: “斯奈普”战斗机的驾驶舱内没有太多的活动空间。

sentences.en: Imagine that there is some activity - say, snipe hunting - that members of Congress want to encourage.
sentences.cn: 想象一下国会议员想要鼓励某项活动，比如说猎鹬。
